io.atomix.primitive.partition

Interface PartitionGroupFactory<C extends PartitionGroupConfig<C>,P extends ManagedPartitionGroup>

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    PrimaryBackupPartitionGroupFactory, RaftPartitionGroupFactory

    public interface PartitionGroupFactory<C extends PartitionGroupConfig<C>,P extends ManagedPartitionGroup>
    Partition group factory.
